val: ECMWF: European Centre for Medium-range Weather Forecast within the Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3S)

ESA and the Glacier_cci Consortium, Distribution: NSIDC (LPDAAC), generation: none (science community), no dedicated funding. There is actually no real ownership for the produced datasets and thus also no responsibility. Those having provided parts of the dataset own their data, but the provided global product is a merged one from many owners.
EUMETSAT Satellite Application Facility on Ocean and Sea Ice / Meteo-France
NASA Langley Research Center SAGE II Team
NASA MODIS Adaptive Processing System (MODAPS) http://modaps.nascom.nasa.gov/services/ List of all products: https://modis.gsfc.nasa.gov/data/dataprod/
Science and Technology Facilities Council (STFC) RAL Space
